text: Hello all, Happy to be here. I am just learning the HubSpot CMS, I hope to have fun and learn throughout the process :ok_hand:
Hello!  I'm new to developing in HubSpot.  Is there anyone who can share their journey into becoming a HubSpot developer?  I'm coming from a front end developer background.

Hello all! I'm new to the HubSpot development side and new to coding in general (learning HTML and CSS on CodeAcademy) but having to learn it up to help our startup with marketing efforts. If anyone has been in the same situation and has any tips to share that would be awesome!:blush:
